solution_line_template: From Danny, there are {danny_watermelons} * {danny_slices_per} = <<{danny_watermelons}*{danny_slices_per}={danny_slices}>>{danny_slices} watermelon slices
From his sister, there are {sister_watermelons} * {sister_slices_per} = <<{sister_watermelons}*{sister_slices_per}={sister_slices}>>{sister_slices} watermelon slices
There are a total of {danny_slices} + {sister_slices} = <<{danny_slices}+{sister_slices}={total_slices}>>{total_slices} watermelon slices
